Name: Apple Mojito
Ingredients: 45 ml Calvados / apple brandy / straight applejack
10 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0Â°Brix)
Instructions: ADD first 5 ingredients to glass and two-thirds fill with crushed ice. CHURN (stir) with bar spoon and then FILL glass with more crushed ice.  TOP with apple soda, briefly stir and serve.
Review: An enduring classic given a touch of apple. Those with a sweet tooth may want to add more apple liqueur or even a dash of sugar syrup.
History: Recipe by yours truly in 2005. Mojito Cocktail history .
